intro: Cryptorhiza haitiensis, commonly known as Haitian cryptorhiza, is a rare flowering plant native to Haiti. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, which includes a wide variety of orchids. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that are typically greenish-yellow in color. It thrives in shaded, moist environments, often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
